3 totsie the pig finishing 1 stuff body do not sew shut you may wish to put some plastic pellets in the bottom of the body before stuffing to add some weight and stability if you do i recommend placing the pellets inside a small fabric pouch before putting them in the body otherwise they are likely to eventually fall out between the spaces of the single crochets this is not only messy but also a potential choking hazard for small children i cut two circles roughly 3 in diameter from scrap fabric sew them together leaving a 1 opening fill the pouch with a scant ¼ cup of pellets and then stitch the opening shut 2 sew head to body using inside loops only of last round of body 3 stuff arms lightly and sew to body 4 sew tail to body 5 weave ends in ears and then sew ears to head i usually sew them between round 8 & 9 6 stuff nose lightly and sew to face using inside loops only of last round of nose 7 sew felt eyes to face alternatively embroider eyes to face 8 embroider eyebrows and nostrils fig 6 © 2008 hooked on fauna all rights reserved -
